result: The study describes the analysis of behavioral characteristics of elderly and young adults using deep learning. It focuses on developing silver robots to provide customized services for the elderly to improve elderly welfare and automate elderly care systems. result: The study describes the development of a socially assistive robot to help clinicians perform Comprehensive Geriatric Assessment (CGA) procedures. The care process involves autonomous driving of tests and processes by the robot to save time for clinicians. The study focuses on long-term care for elderly patients undergoing CGA procedures. It is not about first contact care.

result: The study describes the process of using social robots for psychometric cognitive assessments in elderly participants. It involves administering a robotic cognitive test prototype compared to traditional paper-and-pencil assessments. The study focuses on the initial screening and assessment stage rather than long-term care or first-contact care.
